Reviews.Title: “A well kept secret for a great deal!”
Reviews.Author: Maggie499288
Reviews.Content: 2nd stay el husband dont care resorts preferring quaint doesnt hotel amenities ie ac cable tv microwave fridge hot plate requested service kit plates cutlery etc hotel grounds kept clean pool outdoor grill palapa close downtown beaches 45 walking blocks walking distance super walmart showers hot water 2 apt hotel stayed 2 weeks fraction cost resort inclusive didnt board dog stayed month short term rental prices definitly return addition manager diane excellent

Reviews.Title: “Other guest told me not to review El Acuario hotel because they don't want anyone else to know about it!”
Reviews.Author: SUZ73157
Reviews.Content: administrator diane makes hotel makes feel welcomed ready assist stay detail oriented beautiful courtyard maintained pool bbq bonus close walking distance clean refrig microwave hot plates utensils available enjoyed patio outside stay definately
